channel.title: the Bruise
channel.description: When we fall, we get back up. We fall often.

item.title: The First One
item.description:
There isn’t much to see here yet. This is just a post to make sure everything is working correctly.

  • List are good
  • We like lists

Thanks

You’re the best

No, seriously, thank you

Round and Round and Round We Spin
With Feet of Lead and Wings of Tin
-Vonnegut
